faq.question: What types of content do you create?
faq.answer: We create a wide range of content including blog posts, website copy, landing pages, email campaigns, social media content, whitepapers, case studies, video scripts, infographics, and more. Our content marketing services are fully customizable to your specific needs and goals.

faq.question: How long does it take to see results from content marketing?
faq.answer: Content marketing is a long-term strategy, but many clients start seeing increased organic traffic within 3-6 months. Significant improvements in leads and conversions typically occur within 6-12 months. We provide regular performance reports so you can track progress from day one.

faq.question: Do you write content for my specific industry?
faq.answer: Yes! Our team has experience creating content across 100+ industries. We take time to understand your business, products, and target audience to create authentic, industry-specific content that resonates with your ideal customers in Galway City and beyond.

faq.question: How often should we publish new content?
faq.answer: The ideal publishing frequency depends on your goals and resources. Most businesses benefit from 2-4 blog posts per month, plus regular social media content. We'll recommend a content calendar that balances consistency with quality for maximum impact.

faq.question: Will the content be optimized for SEO?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Every piece of content we create is optimized for search engines while maintaining readability and engagement. We conduct keyword research, optimize meta tags, structure content properly, and follow SEO best practices to help your content rank on Google.

faq.question: Can you help promote the content after it's created?
faq.answer: Yes! Content creation is only half the battle. We develop comprehensive distribution strategies that include social media promotion, email marketing, influencer outreach, and paid amplification when appropriate. We ensure your content reaches the right audience.

faq.question: How do you measure content marketing success?
faq.answer: We track multiple metrics including organic traffic growth, keyword rankings, time on page, engagement rates, lead generation, conversion rates, and ultimately revenue impact. You'll receive detailed monthly reports showing exactly how your content investment is performing.

faq.question: What makes Kraft Agency different from other content agencies in Galway?
faq.answer: We combine local Galway expertise with AI-powered tools and global best practices. Our approach integrates content marketing with your overall digital strategy, ensuring every piece of content serves a purpose. Plus, we focus on measurable ROI, not just vanity metrics.
